synopsis.text: Set 20,000 years in the future, humanity has lost control of Earth to Godzilla. After searching the stars for a new home and returning empty-handed, the remnants of mankind find a planet dominated by a 300 meter tall Godzilla Earth. Led by Captain Haruo, the humans discover MechaGodzilla, a potential weapon for defeating Godzilla. However, conflict arises over using nanometal integration to power MechaGodzilla, a technology that could make humans monstrous. Ultimately, Haruo destroys MechaGodzilla to prevent this outcome, leaving humanity defenseless again. Meanwhile, the Exif alien race has prophetized the arrival of King Ghidorah to Earth. As this winged creature descends, clad in golden light, the planet faces a war on a higher dimension.
synopsis.author: anthropic.claude-v2:1
